services.name: Python Backend
services.start_cmd: bash -c 'eval "$($(which conda) shell.bash hook)" && conda activate aienv && cd /opt/preslaes/AI_Projects/RFP_Cruncher/Python_Backend && nohup uvicorn src.api.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 2999 > logs/python_backend.log 2>&1 &'

services.name: Streamlit App
services.start_cmd: bash -c 'eval "$($(which conda) shell.bash hook)" && conda activate profilerenv && cd /opt/preslaes/AI_Projects/Customer_Profiler && nohup streamlit run app.py --server.port=8501 --server.address=0.0.0.0 > logs/streamlit.log 2>&1 &'

services.name: Backend (Uvicorn)
services.start_cmd: bash -c 'export PYTHONPATH=/opt/preslaes/AI_Projects/FariSight_Analytics && eval "$($(which conda) shell.bash hook)" && conda activate aienv && cd /opt/preslaes/AI_Projects/FariSight_Analytics && nohup uvicorn backend.app:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3002 > logs/uvicorn.log 2>&1 &'

services.name: Python Generator
services.start_cmd: bash -c 'export PYTHONPATH=/opt/preslaes/AI_Projects/FariSight_Analytics && eval "$($(which conda) shell.bash hook)" && conda activate aienv && cd /opt/preslaes/AI_Projects/FariSight_Analytics && nohup uvicorn data.generator:app --host 0.0.0.0 --reload --port 3003 > logs/python.log 2>&1 &'

services.name: Frontend (Streamlit)
services.start_cmd: bash -c 'export PYTHONPATH=/opt/preslaes/AI_Projects/FariSight_Analytics && eval "$($(which conda) shell.bash hook)" && conda activate aienv && cd /opt/preslaes/AI_Projects/FariSight_Analytics && nohup streamlit run ./frontend/app.py --server.port=3004 --server.address=0.0.0.0 > logs/streamlit.log 2>&1 &'
